item.title: ansible
item.description: This is a living document specially crafted for my personal use. Go to cheatsheet About Ansible Mental model: A tool that scaffolds scripts containing commands to be executed against machine(s).

item.title: kubectl
item.description: This is a living document specially crafted for my personal use Go to cheatsheet About kubectl Mental model: It is the CLI tool to interact with Kubernetes API server (apiserver).
